metadata.title: CVE-2016-9558 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: (1) libdwarf/dwarf_leb.c and (2) dwarfdump/print_frames.c in libdwarfbefore 20161124 allow remote attackers to have unspecified impact via acrafted bit pattern in a signed leb number, aka a "negation overflow."

criterions.comment: dwarfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
